Attributes.description: Mechanisms and regulation of functional processes contributing to the assimilation, transport and utilization of water, mineral nutrients and carbon by plants. Restricted to Majors and Honours students in Biology.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) BIOL 121 and one of CHEM 123, CHEM 130; or (b) SCIE 001. (CHEM 233 is recommended.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
